author: JuliaRegistrator

comments.body:
The repository name should end with `.jl` but the package name neither should, nor can, include a dot.
Closed in favor of #102933.

body:
- Registering package: Text2Tex.jl
- Repository: https://github.com/fremling/Text2Tex.jl

- Reference: https://github.com/fremling/Text2Tex.jl/commit/f58afe8e8e8e1015afcf98480fd5a89871e57ae3#commitcomment-139827526
- Description: Lightweight library taht converst unicode caracters to the corresponding latex strings

title: New package: Text2Tex.jl v0.1.0
